message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500. I believe this is a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true worth. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500? This accounts for both of our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? This is the highest I'm willing to go.
